Text: The Vice President of Panama is the second-highest political position in the Government of Panama.

Triplets:
<The Vice President of Panama
1:
--------------------
<Text: Vice President of Panama:  Since 2009, the position of Vice President has been held by only one person.>
Triplets:<Vice President of Panama
3:
--------------------
<Text: Vice President of Panama:  According to the current constitution, Vice Presidents are elected in the same ticket as the President.>
Triplets:<Vice President of Panama

Text: Vice President of Panama:  However, the position of Second Vice President has been abolished since 2009.
